Pujya_KCN_Message: "Body cleanliness is a must. our attitude should be proper
Audio: proper attitude to think about the divine."

Pujya_KCN_Message: For this we attend to purification of our system assiduously practicing the methods given by the Master
The worthy trainer with the power of yogic transmission weakens the lower tendencies of the mind of the trainee, and sows the seed of Divine light in the inner most core of the abhyasi's heart.

Message_Title: The Preliminary step in the right type of training is that the aspirant's tendencies of mind be directed towards God
Pujya_KCN_Message: The Worthy trainer with the powe rof yogic transmission weakens the lower tendencies of the mind of the trainee
Audio: and sows the seed of divine light in the inner most core of the Abhyasi's heart"

Message_Title: The grace of my Master Supreme has enabled us again to assemble here and feel the cozy warmth of the sunshine of His everlasting benignance
Pujya_KCN_Message: "It is our privilege to meet on this most auspicious day of Basanth Panchami in the year 143 of Lalaji Era. We have all assembled here to place our hearts with love and devotion to the lord"

Message_Title: "Our great Master has boldly asserted that one can
Audio: attain liberation in this very life
Book_start_Page: even in a part of it
Book_Exact_Page: provided one is really earnest about it and has the fortune of having a proper guide"

Message_Title: Constant growth of lightness of mind and spirit is the surest test of spiritual progress
Pujya_KCN_Message: Master asserts that The real spiritual training is that which makes our mind disciplined and regulated
Audio: restores moderation in senses and faculties and creates lightness of spirit"

Message_Title: "Heaviness of mind or internal denseness caused by gross forms of worship is a great impediment to our spiritual advancement and should be avoided"
Pujya_KCN_Message: "The problem of worship of forms which hinders our progress is really tough to tackle"
